desc: 불길한 징조라고 전해지는 마조 요미의 날개에서 바진 깃털로 마력을 지니고 있다.

dictionary.lore: The appearance of the Yomi bird is said to foretell misfortune. Since its feathers hold a magical power, they can grant special effects when used as materials in weapons and armor. It's very valuable, rarely being seen in Elgaia, however it has been spotted near the Nocturnal Forest in the Morgan region of Grand Gaia.

name: 요미의 깃털
